org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtPlant

Class DefaultPlantScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtPlant.DefaultPlantScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlantScheduler

    public class DefaultPlantScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlantScheduler
    The default plantScheduler created by PlantConfiguration. Implemented using a ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultPlantScheduler()
      Creates the default plantScheduler.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel(java.lang.Object task)
      Cancels a task, that was scheduled with either schedule(java.lang.Runnable, long) or scheduleAtFixedRate(java.lang.Runnable, long).
      void close()
      Shut down the plantScheduler thread pool.
      double currentTimeMillis()
      Returns the *approximate* time.
      protected long getHeartbeatMillis()
      Controls how often currentTimeMillis is updated: every 5 milliseconds.
      protected int getSchedulerPoolSize()
      Determines the size of the scheduledThreadPool: 2.
      java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> schedule(java.lang.Runnable runnable, int _millisecondDelay)
      Schedule a Runnable to be run at a later time.
      java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleAtFixedRate(java.lang.Runnable runnable, int _millisecondDelay)
      Schedule a Runnable to be run repeatedly.

                                               int _millisecondDelay)
        Description copied from interface: PlantScheduler
        Schedule a Runnable to be run at a later time. The return value is an opaque task object, that can be cancelled.

        Parameters:
        runnable - The Runnable to be scheduled.
        _millisecondDelay - How long to wait before the Runnable is to be run.
